title: ICurve.IsBcurve
description: Gets whether the curve is a b-spline curve.
returns: True if curve is a b-spline curve, false if other curve type
remarks: This method returns True if the curve is an intersection curve, ellipse, trimming curve, or a surface parametric curve. Because intersection and trimming curves can be lines or circles, it is advisable to first determine whether the curve is a circle or line before recognizing it as a b-curve.
